tweets.text: Vegetation clearance starts from tomorrow. A very short visit this am incl: nest building Whitethroat, territorial Cetti's/Reed Warbler & Reed Bunting. Video shows how farcical this is! Still time to see sense @EnvAgency @kiergroup @Natures_Voice @Bucktonbirder  PLEASE RETWEET https://t.co/Tve0B6o4va

Removing this kind of habitat during bird nesting season is appalling practice, and trying to placate us all with the ruse that ecologists will wade through thick brambles to find and protect active nests is insulting. They won’t. @kiergroup @EnvAgency https://t.co/ekGmPRyEmW

And folks further into Keele are getting it inside their houses now.The radius of human misery & suffering grows while @ClareDinnisEA prioritises profits over people & wealth before health. The @EnvAgency (or Anti-EA) will have blood on their hands @Cap_it_off #stopthestink https://t.co/XH1o2ZpIBL

Thorough independent enquiry, public apology&compensation for those the @EnvAgency (or Anti-EA)neglected to protect.A catalogue of decisions with profit at the heart & no consideration for public safety. I want to see the lot on public display & someone in the dock #stopthestink https://t.co/NWNUHMzrIf
@WiseBirding @CABS_REPORTS @EnvAgency @kiergroup @Natures_Voice @Bucktonbirder I agree!! I don't understand this annual ritual. The birds are running out of places to go!
@WiseBirding @Jon_Heath_ @EnvAgency @kiergroup @Natures_Voice @Bucktonbirder Cleared for what?

@WiseBirding @EnvAgency @kiergroup @Natures_Voice @Bucktonbirder Very disappointing to hear this being done just as many birds will be nesting in that scrub. Worst possible time to do it, unbelievable! 😡

We continue to support @shropsfire & partners respond to the fire at the former Greenway Polymers waste site #Telford

We're using tankers to remove contaminated fire water to protect local rivers & abstractors and today, sampling the river #Tern to monitor environmental impacts. https://t.co/BhxjGK4f3b
@WiseBirding @rachbicker @EnvAgency @kiergroup @Natures_Voice @Bucktonbirder My heart breaks for these poor birds , what happened to leaving their habitats safe until winter ? Cruel
Surely the 'ecologists' will quickly realise that nests would be disturbed (destroyed) and the work will be postponed; or am I being hopelessly optimistic? https://t.co/2aNdn0c26T

urls.title: News: Lower Otter Restoration Project
urls.description: The Lower Otter Restoration Project: A sutainable future for people and wildlife

tweets.text: I don't usually do this sort of thing, but when it is on my local patch it really gets to me!! Scrub & tree removal in May is terrible practice. Please retweet. https://t.co/cYEIymHH0K Two videos showing the area & my concerns. @DevonWildlife @Natures_Voice @EnvAgency @kiergroup https://t.co/U8doUyBP5K
@WiseBirding @Suebelcher6 @DevonWildlife @Natures_Voice @EnvAgency @kiergroup Humans out of touch with #Nature the time to do it would be winter
@WiseBirding @EnvAgency @kiergroup @Natures_Voice @Bucktonbirder Why didn't they do it during the winter
@DrMickSalt Any comment from @EnvAgencyMids @PHE_uk or @RedIndustries2 This is shocking #WalleysQuarry

@DrMickSalt @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA Is the situation under control yet? Is your failure to regulate @RedIndustries2 negligent? Is the cost to health @PHE_uk just collateral damage? Should @JamesBevanEA #sackclaredinnis or should they both resign  #crimesagainsthumanity #stopthestink

Judging by social media it’s another appalling evening of odour - reports from Knutton, Milehouse, Wolstanton, Basford, Porthill. 😢🤢

Please keep reporting to the @EnvAgency on 0800 80 70 60 #StopTheStink

@tayz_BETH @scottdegg @EnvAgency We ve even ringing for 20 years, had a few years off after they were taken to court by some residents, I wasntincolved but the outcome was no stink for a long time, since @RedIndustries2 took over its been horrendous & far worse than Lafarge #stopthestink

4 mths ago the Stink visited us for the 1st time. 3 mths ago I rang @EnvAgency angry that I couldnt open windows at night. 2 mths ago my calls were about solid walls of gas outside my home. 1 mth ago calls to @EnvAgency were about smarting eyes, headaches, AND NOW I JUST WEEP.

Thank you.We all need to stick together.The radius continues to grow,the black hole of Whalley’s landfill @RedIndustries2 continues to assimilate more&more houses into its life of misery.We will never give up the good fight! @Cap_it_off Cap_it_off @EnvAgency #stopthestink https://t.co/7NJdpMEK5W https://t.co/bkN67YRl5b

@DJAndyMoor @HelenVi00175623 @djlange @StinkStopthe We are being failed by the @EnvAgency,gas and radius affected worsening, children&adults suffering health harms,people on the brink mentally,invaded night after night inside our homes.We need mass public support to force the EA to stop this-they are letting them tip again 😔

@WiseBirding @EnvAgency @kiergroup @Natures_Voice @Bucktonbirder It pains me to think of the cumulative effect of this happening across the country. If our own timeline/project management means we're delayed, & miss the chance to carry out work outside of the breeding season, then that's on us. We should accept we missed our timeslot & *wait*.

urls.title: Petition: Review the Regulation of Odour Management of Landfill Sites
urls.description: We call for the Government to review how the Environment Agency monitors and manages levels of malodourous gasses. Consideration should be given to compulsory monitoring of emissions of landfill sites and for the EA to be obliged to act with urgency when high levels of odour complaints are received.

tweets.text: @DJAndyMoor @HelenVi00175623 @djlange @StinkStopthe Please share these pictures of children suffering locally. Residents need air purifiers to sleep. @EnvAgency are negligent and allowing it to happen. Please share and sign the petition to make sure this does not happen in the UK ever again #stopthestink https://t.co/Lgsdqydotl https://t.co/PQebyt4QnB

Shame on you @EnvAgencyMids @PHE_uk @RedIndustries2 @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA It’s not getting better! Residents of Staffordshire village launch fightback against a landfill https://t.co/cQ4CnRZz7f via @MailOnline #StopTheStink

@earthFgardener @NatResWales @bettwsresident @DwrCymru @RiverActionUK @GeorgeMonbiot @IoloWilliams2 @JFSAberconwy @lesley4wrexham @BBCWales @aarwynne They permit it. I've been involved with it for too long to know they aren't suddenly going to have an epiphany of conscience. There's no pressure from our elected representatives, or when there it it disappears into the ether after a bit of exposure for them. I'll be in coms 1/2

This is how it began for us too, can’t see how we can stay in the houses in summer, the heat on top or being ill all the time would be suffocating @PHE_EoEngland @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK #stopthestink @ClareDinnisEA @BorisJohnson @JamesBevanEA @MPGeorgeEustice @Cap_it_off https://t.co/jzawstYSbH
